DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability single iontophoretic dose buffer solution administer EyeGate® II Drug Delivery System healthy adult human volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Study Transscleral Iontophoresis EyeGate® II Drug Delivery Device System
DOC.detailed_description: This single center , randomize , single-masked , comparative group , safety tolerability study single dose level citrate buffer deliver transcleral iontophoresis administer via EyeGate® II Drug Delivery System . The current study also determine safety tolerability dose range transcleral iontophoresis 2 mA 7 mA determine safety tolerability application Eyegate II system eye time range 10.5 minute .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult Normal ophthalmic examination eye Presence subjective ocular symptom Presence conjunctival hyperemia , chemosis , watering , conjunctival discharge Ocular trauma
